content: As someone who hasn’t really tuned in yet, man is this good to hear. Of course, the Bulls said they wanted to get younger and rebuild and then signed Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rando, so the fandom can be forgiven for being a little puzzled. Also while three may be a trend in journalism, it ain’t in basketball. If the Bulls lose their last 20 games because of old knees and bad hips, the rest really doesn’t matter. But I’m happy to pretend this is significant, that’s really what being a Chicago sports fan is all about.
